title: DC again and again? idk what it is actually
body: It showed I was 100% in loading page, but I wait for about 5 mins and still can't get in the game. Then i try to rec it. After rec i can just read 1 sentence from my m8 then the whole game seems like freeze. When i quit the game and rec again i got only 3 to 4 sec to do sth then i can't control my champ anymore and the whole game seems like freeze again, but there is not showing " reconnecting", It just freezes. i tried times but still the same. Is it drop hacking?

replies.body:
This is not drop-hacking. Drop-hacking would almost definitely get you the "Attempting to reconnect..." dialogue. This is a client side issue. What OS are you on?

Have you tried repairing your client (back up your item sets first!)?
